snippet.title: They Bleed Pixels - Coming to Nintendo Switch™ Oct 22, 2020 - Pre-Order Now!
snippet.description:
US eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/they-bleed-pixels-switch/
UK eShop: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/They-Bleed-Pixels-1859334.html

A fiendishly difficult action platformer inspired by weird fiction and gothic horror. Coming Oct 22nd, 2020 to the Nintendo Switch! Pre-orders available now on the  Nintendo eShop!

As an anonymous student of the Lafcadio Academy for Troubled Young Ladies, you must battle through your nightmares to defeat a curse that’s slowly transforming your body into a clawed demonic form. 

They Bleed Pixels balances a perfect mix of fast-paced acrobatic platforming and fierce, one-button, slash’em up combat. By suppressing your urge to button mash in favor of focusing on stylish and smart kills, you are rewarded with checkpoints you can choose when to place for safety... or try your luck by holding onto them for extra bonus points.

Pre-order today on the Nintendo eShop!
